page.title: 02Sparrowpit
page.content: I live in a house in Sparrowpit.It is made of limestone and has a large barn attached. The village has a pub called the Wanted Inn which sells alcohol and snacks. The daily bus service is the only public transport but most people have a car. There is a Methodist Chapel,a village hall where dances are held,a small play area with swings,a telephone box and a post box. We own about two hundred acres we have four David Brown tractors and a Zetor plus a Supa Dexter.We have a hundred milk cows,eighty sheep as well as a few ducks and goats. I expect to be a farmer when I leave school at sixteen.
